name: international movie trailer festival
overview:
The 1st Annual INTERNATIONAL MOVIE TRAILER FESTIVAL (IMTF) is an online contest that celebrates the art of the movie trailer. Entrants are invited to submit trailers for movies theyâ€™ve shot or trailers for movies they dream of making some day. All genres are accepted, including documentaries.

Entries will be shown 24/7 in our virtual theater with an advanced database that allows fans, producers, and exhibitors to find the trailers in a variety of ways.

The top awardsâ€”including the Grand Prize of $5,000â€”will be determined by a jury of industry experts including Scott Rosenfelt, producer of MYSTIC PIZZA. There is a $1000 prize for the best trailer for a movie not yet made as well as $1000 prize for a trailer for a produced movie.

The Peopleâ€™s Choice Award will be made by visitors to the site. Thereâ€™s a special student prize of $500 plus a $500 grant for the studentâ€™s school.

Joining the online community gives access to free resources including video tips from expert filmmakers plus the book â€œMoviemaking Illustrated.â€A Best-of-the-Festival reel will be shown online and at selected festivals.
